A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A good movie overall but probably not as good as the force as the force awakens. The cantobight story line was very stupid and it just dragged on at that part. Also\, too many questions still unanswered from TFA. The movie also has pros. The story with Kylo Ren and Rey was interesting and the action was great. Overall\, it is a good movie but definitely not as good as the force awakens.
